body.p: Woodford County, Kentucky native. Wholesale dry goods merchant in Louisville, Kentucky. Opened the Galt House hotel in Louisville in partnership with Aris Throckmorton. Married Adele Barney Everett. Trustee of the University of Louisville. Member of the board of directors of the Bank of Kentucky.
